bibl.title: Letter from the Chief Sanitary Officer to the Chairman of the Isthmian Canal Commission, April 24, 1905

div1.p: The Chief Sanitary Officer requests that Shimer be assigned duty in the Sanitary Department.

div1.head: Letter from the Chief Sanitary Officer to the Chairman of the Isthmian Canal Commission, April 24, 1905
div1.opener:
2284
Rear Admiral JOHN G. WALKER,
United States Navy, CHAIRMAN.
Major General GEORGE W. DAVIS,
United States Army.
WILLIAM BARCLAY PARSONS, C. E.
WILLIAM H. BURR, C. E.
BENJAMIN M. HARROD, C. E.
C. EWALD GRUNSKY, C. E.
MR. FRANK J. HECKER.
ISTHMIAN CANAL COMMISSION
April 24, 1905
Chairman of the Isthmian Canal Commission,
(Through the Governor of the Canal Zone)
Washington, D.C.
Sir:-
div1.p:
I request the detail for duty in the Sanitary Department
of Dr. Ira A. Shimer, Ass't Surgeon, U.S.A.
div1.closer: Very respectfully yours, Chief Sanitary Officer.
